name: Penguins Panic
description:
<If anything goes wrong or for full screen/better quality, you can download the desktop version below.>

A group of penguins is lost on unstable ice and under unstable weather, take care of them!

Penguins have to respect some form of social distancing, or they get too warm really fast. Don't spread them too much apart from each others however, or they will freeze to death. Meanwhile, the ice is melting, make sure they don't fall in the sea.

  • Hold left click to drag penguins around.
  • Pay attention to the thermometer on the left, the warmer it gets, the farther penguins should be from each other.
  • You score points by keeping penguins alive.

     Everything was made by me during the jam, music by my girlfriend.
